statements: DELETE FROM human_rights_violations WHERE perpetrator_name = 'John Doe' AND violation_type = 'Discrimination';
DELETE FROM perpetrators WHERE perpetrator_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM victims WHERE victim_id = 100 AND violation_type = 'Theft';
DELETE FROM perpetrators WHERE perpetrator_age < 30 OR violation_details LIKE '%abuse%';
DELETE FROM Perpetrators WHERE organization = 'ABC Corp';
DELETE FROM Perpetrators WHERE organization = 'CorruptCo' AND role = 'Manager';
DELETE FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA';
